name: Lupengo
overview: Lupengo a simple arcade-like, Pengo style game, yet completely Penguin free and freely available in GPL. Lupengo for Amiga is a full-featured arcade-like game, that I started writing in 1987; I never had time to make it commercial quality, so I am releasing now as free software. This also means that whoever wants to take over this project is free to do so. Ironically this non-penguin game is also available for Linux.
